alert.note: Alert for Lincoln; Logan; McPherson (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 12 at 1:41PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN LINCOLN... SOUTHWESTERN LOGAN AND SOUTHEASTERN MCPHERSON COUNTIES THROUGH 230 PM CDT... At 141 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hershey, or 10 miles west of North Platte, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Sutherland, Hershey, Coker, O`Fallons, and Birdwood. This includes Highway 97 between mile markers 4 and 23. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
